title: 700# Bear vs. Man w/shotgun - Result: draw
body: <p>Only on <a href="http://www.ananova.com/news/story/sm_1132068.html?menu=news.quirkies" title="Man fights off bear then shoots himself">Ananova Quirkies would you find a story like this</a>.  To break out of a 700-pound bear hug, with the butt of your shotgun and only a warning shot - then falling and shooting yourself in the head?!?!  At least he lived to tell about it.  Of course, thanks to the lapse of the assault weapons ban here in the US he would've been able to squeeze of at least 6 warning shots, and he would've probably shot himself in the head 3 times.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-19

700# Bear vs. Man w/shotgun - Result: draw

Only on
